title: Simone Biles Becomes Most Decorated Gymnast In World Championship History With 25 Gold Medals
text:
US gymnastics star Simone Biles scripted history by becoming the most decorated player in World Championships after winning her 25th gold medal.

AFP

The 22-year-old won her fifth gold medal in the women's floor final to conclude her best showing at the tournament. Biles, who won the beam title earlier in the day, claimed an unrivalled 19th world gold following her previous successes in the team, all-around and vault events in Stuttgart.

It was another day at the office for the record shattering American, who is is leaving everyone in her wake and setting unprecedented records.

AP

Don't Miss 331 SHARES 34 K SHARES 13.9 K SHARES 207 SHARES 5.1 K SHARES

Her victories on the beam and floor made Biles the most decorated gymnast in history, surpassing the previous all-time record of 23 world medals won by men's star Vitaly Scherbo of Belarus in the 1990s.

AP

After earning a medal on vault, her 23rd World Championships medal, Simone Biles had equalled the previous record, but she went two better when she won the gold medals in the beam and floor finals.

With five gold medals at the 2019 World Championships, Biles tied the record for most world titles on one apparatus with Italian Jury Chechi (who won five gold medals on Still Rings) and Russian Svetlana Khorkina (who won five gold medals on Uneven Bars).
description: US gymnastics star Simone Biles scrpted history by becoming the most decorated player in World Championships after winning her 25th gold medal. The 22 year-old won her fifth gold medal in the women's floor final to conclude her best showing at the tournament.
